Title: Repeals subdivision 4 of section 1399-m-1 of the public health law, relating to exemptions for certain vapor products dealers from the prohibition of selling flavored products
Summary: Relates to exemptions for certain vapor products dealers from the prohibition of selling flavored products.
LawCode: Rpld ยง1399-mm-1 sub 4, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 4 of section 1399-mm-l of the public health law, relating to exempting certain vapor products dealers from the prohibition of selling flavored products
